description:
This week we share our thoughts on the recent problematic reports surrounding the release of The Candlekeep Mysteries Adventure Book and the experiences of POC writers and game designers working on the project.


If you enjoy this podcast please help us out by leaving a review and sharing with your fellow adventurers.
